Test Name: MEGRIM (Methylgranulocyte Immunoglobulin), IgE, and Serum Analysis
Specimen Type: MEGRIM: Whole blood; IgE & Serum: Serum
Purpose: To perform and document MEGRIM, IgE, and Serum analyses, ensuring accurate, consistent, and CLIA-compliant results.
Container: MEGRIM: EDTA tube; IgE & Serum: Red-top or serum separator (SST) tube
Equipment: Automated analyzer for MEGRIM/IgE/Serum assays, centrifuge, pipettes, vortex mixer, refrigerators/freezers
